songs.title: Neon
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Stars fade
Hearts break
Fair trade
Is it ever even
Don't wait
To stay
Awake
When you realize

[Pre-Chorus]
That time just keeps on moving
While you're standing next to living in the dark

[Chorus]
So neon, neon
Burn up the sky, just like a fantasy where all that I can see is
Neon, neon
Show me your light, I'm running out of time so give me a sign
Neon, neon, neon
Give me a sign, neon
Neon, neon
Give me a sign, neon

[Verse 2]
Sun-set
Strip, red
Lights they
Always call my name
And I
Don't want more time
Won't kill me

[Pre-Chorus]
That time just keeps on moving
While you're standing next to living in the dark

[Chorus]
So neon, neon
Burn up the sky, just like a fantasy where all that I can see is
Neon, neon
Show me your light, I'm running out of time so give me a sign
Neon, neon, neon
Give me a sign, neon
Neon, neon
Give me a sign, neon

[Bridge]
I've been looking for the reason
What's the answer or the meaning of it all
All
Hoping that you're gonna show me just
You're always here glowing in the dark
Yeah
Neon
Neon

[Chorus]
So neon, neon
Burn up the sky, just like a fantasy where all that I can see is
Neon, neon
Show me your light, I'm running out of time so give me a sign
Neon, neon, neon
Give me a sign, neon
Neon, neon
Give me a sign, neon
